name: react_sql_html
description: Step 001. Create you prefer folder name. Under the that folder create server and client subdirectory. Step 002. Under server directory and Get into terminal. type npm init -y Step 003. Modify package.json file. Step 004. Make these changes.     "main": "server.js",     "start": "node index.js",     "dev": "nodemon server.js" Step 005. Create server.js file. Step 006. Get into terminal and type npm install express cors nodemon Step 007. Create server.js const express = require('express') const mysql = require('mysql') const cors = require('cors') const path = require('path') const { GiConsoleController } = require('react-icons/gi') const app = express()
